name: Sticks, Pipes, and the Call of Nature
name_original: Sticks, Pipes, and the Call of Nature
description:
SPATCON

It's THE illest rhythm game of the 4th century!

Dance, jam, and rock out to the freshest beats of Ancient Greece!

How To Play

As the notes pass the first fret, tap the corresponding number key that pops up. The closer the note is to the fret, the greater the score!

Move on to increasingly challenging levels as you rock out. If not, well, you get to try again.

Note: Both numpad and number keys are supported

Credits

Kermed
Elenesski
Ammunoz
